- Week of April 20: Host open house activities.

- Week of May 22: Prepare curriculum for sprint activities, recruit mentors to deliver sprint activities, schedule sprint activities, and deliver sprint activities.

- Week of October 31: Host Final Demo Day.
- Weeks with no specific tasks listed: Conduct basic due diligence, develop mentorship strategy and outreach emails, recruit program partners, prepare criteria for selection, and finalize mid-program and end-of-program reports.
